item.title: 天然气发电无法轻松解决人工智能蓬勃发展的问题
item.description:
美国的新发电能力开发商面临着涡轮机成本飙升和等待时间过长的问题。【原文：

Developers of new generation capacity in the US face soaring costs and long wait times for turbines.

】

item.title: 印度在高报黄金进口后修复创纪录的贸易赤字
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度政府在上个月发现黄金进口数据和贸易数据在计算过程中存在差异，目前仍在对这些数据进行最后修订。【原文：India’s government is still finalizing revisions to gold import figures and trade data after discovering discrepancies in their calculation last month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其防通胀里拉推动新兴市场最佳套利交易
item.description: 土耳其央行管理里拉的策略为交易者享受更多世界上最有利可图的套利交易奠定了基础。【原文：The Turkish central bank’s strategy for managing the lira is laying the ground for traders to enjoy even more of the world’s most profitable carry trade.】

item.title: 印度经济放缓加剧，8% 增长新纪元希望破灭
item.description: 多年来，印度蓬勃发展的经济使人们欣喜地认为，这个南亚国家已经进入了一个快速增长的新时代，推动其市场达到新的高度，并使人们期望它将在几十年内摆脱发展中国家的地位。【原文：For years, India’s booming economy fueled exuberance that the South Asian nation had entered a new era of faster growth, powering its markets to new heights and raising expectations it would exit the trenches of developing-nation status in a few decades.】

item.title: 全球增长最快的主要经济体增速放缓
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，我们将关注印度的增长绊脚石。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today, we’re looking at India’s growth stumble. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 马斯克升级与欧盟在言论自由和选举公平问题上的斗争
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）代表极右翼德国选择党（Alternative for Germany）所采取的行动正在加剧他与欧洲科技监管机构的冲突。但首先...【原文：Elon Musk’s actions on behalf of the far-right Alternative for Germany party are ratcheting up his conflicts with European tech regulators. But first...】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州颁布新法规限制医疗领域的私募股权投资
item.description: 根据马萨诸塞州州长莫拉-希利（Maura Healey）计划于周三签署的一项新法律，医疗保健行业的私募股权投资者将在马萨诸塞州面临更多监督。【原文：Private equity investors in the health-care industry will face additional oversight in Massachusetts under a new law that Governor Maura Healey plans to sign on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普对胰岛素和助听器出口国丹麦征收关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普经常对美国的主要贸易伙伴发出经济威胁。但周二他又瞄准了其中一个较小的贸易伙伴，警告说如果这个经济规模与密苏里州相当的国家拒绝他购买格陵兰岛的提议，他将 "对丹麦征收极高的关税"。【原文：Donald Trump regularly lobs economic threats at major US trading partners. But he took aim Tuesday at one of the smaller ones, warning that he’d “tariff Denmark at a very high level” if the country with an economy the size of Missouri’s resists his offer to buy Greenland.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率略低于 7%，阻碍了购房热情
item.description: 今年年初，美国抵押贷款利率升至略低于 7%的水平，购房申请指数跌至 2 月份以来的最低水平，这进一步证明了房地产市场正处于挣扎之中。【原文：US mortgage rates edged up to just shy of 7% at the turn of year and a gauge of home-purchase applications tumbled to the lowest level since February, adding to evidence of a struggling housing market.】

item.title: 阿克曼从特朗普交易中获利 1200%，但交易远未结束
item.description: 美国大选两个月后，特朗普最引人注目的交易不是比特币、特斯拉公司或其他可能的嫌疑人。相反，它是华尔街许多人早已遗忘的一家有着 87 年历史的老顽固公司的股票。【原文：Two months after the US election, the most spectacular of all Trump trades isn’t Bitcoin, Tesla Inc. or any other likely suspects. Rather, it’s shares of a stodgy, 87-year-old company many on Wall Street had forgotten about long ago.】

item.title: TikTok 商店的竞争对手 Whatnot 以 50 亿美元估值融资
item.description: 与嘀嗒购物竞争的直播购物平台 Whatnot Inc. 在由 Greycroft Partners、DST Global 和 Avra 领投的一轮融资中以 49.7 亿美元的估值筹集了 2.65 亿美元。【原文：Whatnot Inc., a livestream shopping platform that competes with TikTok Shop, raised $265 million at a valuation of $4.97 billion in a funding round led by Greycroft Partners, DST Global and Avra.】

item.title: 医疗科技公司 Brainlab 据称将为德国首次公开募股寻求投标
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，医疗技术公司 Brainlab AG 已就其可能在法兰克福进行的首次公开募股征集银行建议书。【原文：Medical technology firm Brainlab AG has asked for bank proposals for its potential initial public offering in Frankfurt, which could take place as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 智利消费者价格自 6 月以来首次出现月度下降
item.description: 智利上个月的消费价格自 6 月份以来首次下降，这对中央银行在监控包括电费上涨在内的通胀威胁时只能起到有限的缓解作用。【原文：Chile’s consumer prices fell last month for the first time since June, giving the central bank only limited relief as it monitors inflationary threats including electricity tariff hikes.】

item.title: AppLovin 纳斯达克最高涨幅达 700% 为 2025 年的挑战埋下伏笔
item.description: 在经历了去年年底的大涨之后，AppLovin 公司的股价可能已经没有动力了。【原文：After a blistering rally at the end of last year, shares in AppLovin Corp. may be running out of steam.】

item.title: 英国通胀挂钩收益率创特鲁斯 2022 年执政以来新高
item.description: 自 2022 年底市场崩溃以来，英国 30 年期通胀挂钩债券的收益率首次升至 2%。【原文：The yield on the UK’s 30-year inflation-linked bonds rose to 2% for the first time since the market meltdown in late 2022.】

item.title: 中美债券收益率走向相反方向
item.description: 世界上最大的两个经济体的债券市场发出的信号对比再明显不过了。【原文：The contrast in signals from the bond markets of the world’s two largest economies couldn’t be clearer.】

item.title: 美国政府正在研究解决住房危机的可能方案
item.description:
开放公共土地供开发的想法得到了两党的支持，并减少了繁文缛节。【原文：

The idea of opening up public lands to development enjoys bipartisan support and cuts through red tape.

】

item.title: 大众新童子军电动车系列中汽油发动机版本订单最多
item.description: Scout Motors 是大众汽车公司支持的新系列电气化 SUV 和皮卡的制造商，该公司表示，目前大多数美国汽车购买者希望该品牌的车型配备汽油发动机以支持电池。【原文：Scout Motors, maker of a new line of electrified SUVs and pickup trucks backed by Volkswagen AG, says what most US car buyers want from the brand now is its models equipped with a gasoline-fueled engine to back up the battery.】

item.title: 老板提出丹麦征税，特朗普贸易团队将面临狂野之旅
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普威胁就丹麦对格陵兰岛的控制权对其征收关税，并臆想用 "经济力量 "将加拿大吸收为美国的一个州，这些都再次提醒人们，当选总统的贸易议程的执行可能会多么坎坷。【原文：Donald Trump’s threat of tariffs on Denmark over its control of Greenland and musings about “economic force” to absorb Canada as a US state were a fresh reminder of how rocky executing the president-elect’s trade agenda could prove.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击风车后引发风电股暴跌
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他的目标是在上任后不再在美国新建风力发电厂，在此之后，一些欧洲最大的风力发电公司的股票周三下跌。【原文：Shares in some of Europe’s biggest wind power companies fell Wednesday after President-elect Donald Trump said he aimed to have no new windmills in the US after taking office.】

item.title: 食品成本导致加纳通胀率创八个月新高
item.description: 12 月份，加纳的年通货膨胀率攀升至八个月来的最高水平，降低了本月晚些时候降息的可能性。【原文：Ghana’s annual inflation rate climbed to its highest level in eight months in December, reducing the prospects of an interest-rate cut later this month.】

item.title: 普京蓬勃发展的战争经济有望平稳着陆
item.description: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统入侵乌克兰引发了俄罗斯在政府刺激政策支持下的经济繁荣。近三年来，种种迹象表明，这笔账单即将到期。【原文：President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine triggered an economic boom in Russia built on the back of government stimulus. Almost three years on, there are gathering signs the bill is about to come due.】

item.title: 爱尔兰危机时期的不良银行制定了 2025 年清盘计划
item.description: 爱尔兰国家资产管理局周四制定了一项计划，将在 2025 年底前完成清盘工作。【原文：Ireland’s National Asset Management Agency set out a plan to complete its wind down by the end of 2025 on Thursday.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，印尼将把出口收入留在国内一年
item.description: 印尼当地新闻媒体 Kontan 援引一位高级部长的话报道称，印尼将要求自然资源出口商将部分外汇收入留在岸上至少一年，以增加外汇储备。【原文：Indonesia will require exporters of natural resources to keep part of their foreign currency earnings onshore for at least one year in a bid to boost foreign reserves, local news outlet Kontan reported, citing a senior minister.】

item.title: 欧盟誓言 "积极 "调查《数字规则手册》下的 X 问题
item.description: 欧盟高级数字官员承诺将 "积极 "推进对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交网络是否违反欧盟内容审核法的调查。【原文：The European Union’s top digital officials have committed to “energetically” push forward an investigation into whether Elon Musk’s X social network breached the bloc’s content moderation law.】

item.title: 喜力印度分公司停止向重要邦销售啤酒，股价下跌
item.description: 喜力公司（Heineken NV）的印度分公司以无利可图的价格和拖欠货款为由，暂停向印度南部的特兰加纳邦供应啤酒。【原文：Heineken NV’s Indian unit suspended supply of beer to the southern Indian state of Telangana, citing unprofitable prices and missed payments.】

item.title: 从国防到可再生能源，特朗普言论引发股市大波动
item.description: 就职典礼前几天，唐纳德-特朗普发表了从国防到可再生能源，甚至格陵兰岛的各种言论，令股市为之振奋。【原文：Days before his inauguration, Donald Trump is moving stock markets with comments on everything from defense to renewable energy, and even Greenland.】

item.title: 美光斥资 70 亿美元建设新加坡存储芯片工厂
item.description: 随着人工智能对先进存储芯片需求的增长，美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc. is investing $7 billion over the next several years to expand its manufacturing footprint in Singapore, as artificial intelligence boosts demand for advanced memory chips.】

item.title: 芬兰称被扣押的影子舰队油轮不适航
item.description: 芬兰当局在对这艘被扣押的油轮进行检查后，认为其不适航，而这艘油轮是俄罗斯石油运输船队的一部分。【原文：Finnish authorities deemed the detained tanker that’s part of the fleet carrying Russian oil as not seaworthy after inspections onboard.】

item.title: 英国陷入困境的股票基金第九年遭遇资金外流
item.description: 投资者连续第九年将资金撤出英国股票基金，因为他们继续放弃表现不佳的市场，转而在美国科技股中寻找更好的回报。【原文：Investors moved money out of UK-focused equity funds for a ninth straight year as they continue to bail on an underperforming market and find better returns in US tech stocks.】
